private_key.description: Primary account API key to access your Mailgun data.
private_key.title: Private API Key

domain_region.description: Domain region code. 'EU' or 'US' are possible values. The default is 'US'.
domain_region.title: Domain Region Code

start_date.title: Replication Start Date
start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2020-10-01 00:00:00. Any data before this date will not be replicated. If omitted, defaults to 3 days ago.
